tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NN #quote)) (NP (DT A) (NN man))) (VP (VBZ is) (RB about) (ADJP (RB as) (JJ big) (PP (IN as) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS things)) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT that)) (S (VP (VBP make) (S (NP (PRP him)) (ADJP (JJ angry)))))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [big/JJ nsubj>[#quote/NN dep>[man/NN det>A/DT]] cop>is/VBZ advmod>about/RB advmod>as/RB nmod:as>[things/NNS case>as/IN det>the/DT acl:relcl>[make/VBP nsubj>that/WDT xcomp>[angry/JJ nsubj>him/PRP]]] punct>./.]
